Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Panorama in Syracuse, you'll be minutes from Rope-makers' Cave and Archaeological Park of Neapolis. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Latomia del Paradiso and Ear of Dionysius.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 49 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as babysitting/childcare. Additional amenities include a television in the lobby, tour/ticket assistance, and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Panorama in Syracuse, you'll be minutes from Rope-makers' Cave and Archaeological Park of Neapolis. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Latomia del Paradiso and Ear of Dionysius.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Rope-makers' Cave - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Latomia del Paradiso - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Ear of Dionysius - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Greek Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
San Nicolo dei Cordari - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Archaeological Park of Neapolis - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Technopark Archimedes - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Altar of Hieron II - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Catacombs of St. John - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Roman Amphitheatre - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Museo Archeologico Regionale Paolo Orsi - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Papyrus Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Madonna delle Lacrime - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Capuchin Quarry - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Ginnasio Romano - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Panorama is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 47 km / 29.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
